context: Expedia Group competes through unified platform across Expedia, Hotels.com, Vrbo, and B2B travel technology. AI-powered trip planning enhances the booking experience.

competitors.name: Booking Holdings
competitors.notes: Global OTA leader with connected trip strategy

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: AI travel assistant threatening OTA model

competitors.name: Trip.com Group
competitors.notes: Major Asian OTA with global expansion

competitors.name: Hopper
competitors.notes: Mobile travel fintech with price prediction AI

competitors.name: Hotel Direct Channels
competitors.notes: Chains driving direct bookings with AI and loyalty

competitors.name: Airline NDC
competitors.notes: Airlines using new distribution to go direct
